titles: An apology of the treatise De non temerandis ecclesiis against a treatie by an unknowne authour, written against it in some particulars / by Sir Henry Spelman Knight ; also his epistle to Richard Carew Esquire, of Anthony in Cornwall concerning tithes.
author: Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
publisher: Printed by J.L. for Philemon Stephens, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Spelman, Henry, --  Sir, 1564?-1641. --  De non temerandis ecclesiis.
